name: Dots & Walls
description:
Press SPACE or LMB anywhere on screen to move highlighted dot to avoid incoming walls. It's all. Simple, but not easy. Be carefull! It's really addictive!

This version is ads free. If you achieve 100 pts or 300 pts, new soundtracks will be unlocked.

If you want to play for free, but with ads, you can download game from Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Tehawar.DotsWalls
